componentDescription: Displays various types of messages with customizable content, icons, actions, and closing behavior.

subtitle.description: The secondary text content of the message.

variant.description: The type or category of the message, influencing its styling.

show.description: Controls the visibility of the message.

hide.description: A function to call to dismiss or hide the message.

title.description: The main title or heading of the message.

theme.description: Custom theme object to override default message styles.

isClosable.description: Determines if the message can be manually closed by the user.

views.description: Custom styles for various parts of the message component.

action.description: A callback function to execute when the action button is clicked.

actionText.description: The text displayed on the action button.

showIcon.description: Determines if an icon corresponding to the message variant should be displayed.

timeout.description: The duration in milliseconds after which the message automatically hides.
